column2: "It's ok for you, killer. You've got natural instincts you can rely on..."
"So, the thing I'm up against this time is one of those Oceanids from the Coast. They call it Org Blan."
"It's not the strongest thing out there, but it's got all its ranges covered, so I can't figure out how to approach it."
"But it won't give a killer like you any trouble! Show me what to do so I can follow your lead! I'm beggin' ya here!"
